[H1]Ideologies[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ideologies in Civ4 Reimagined are a concept similar to religions. Every civ can "adopt" one ideology and those will have a big impact on diplomatic relations. Unlike religions, ideologies are determined by your civic choices. Every civic gives influence to certain ideologies and decreases the incluence to others. Each civ gets assigned the ideology which has the biggest influence from its chosen civics. Ideologies can unlock certain wonders which get stronger with each civilization that adopts your ideology.[PARAGRAPH:1]Ideologies get activated after someone discovers the [LINK=literal]Liberalism[\LINK] technology. From that point on you can always see the different ideology influences in your realm in the Civics screen. Also the icon next to a player in the scoreboard shows their current ideology.
